casebody.data:
No. 10-8731. Ronnie M. Lyles, Petitioner v. Mary Ann Vial Lemmon, et al. 564 U.S. 1056, 132 S. Ct. 53,

180 L. Ed. 2d 921,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 5027. July 25, 2011.

Petition for rehearing denied.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Former decision, 563 U.S. 929, 131 S. Ct. 1818, 179 L. Ed. 2d 794, 2011 U.S. LEXIS 2680.
